original_text:
It is not good to eat too much honey,
    nor is it honorable to search out matters that are too deep.
korean_text: 꿀을 많이 먹는 것이 좋지 못하고 자기의 영예를 구하는 것이 헛되니라

sentences.original_text: It is not good to eat too much honey,
sentences.korean_translation: 꿀을 너무 많이 먹는 것은 좋지 않으며,

sentences.original_text: nor is it honorable to search out matters
sentences.korean_translation: 깊은 일을 탐구하는 것도 존귀하지 않다
